img_summary: The image depicts the **Shock-Quelling Powder**, an uncommon item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This item is used to instantly remove the Shocked state and temporarily boost Shock Resistance. It can be crafted at the Shrine store under "Make Medicines" after assisting Xu Dog in defeating Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw in Sandgate Village. Crafting requires **1 Gentian** and **1 Jade Lotus**.
